ai_business_context: Fresh Mart is a grocery store with produce, dairy, checkout lanes, and customer restrooms. Shoppers submit feedback about spills, equipment issues (refrigeration, doors, carts), cleanliness, safety hazards, and suggestions for products or service improvements.
ai_categorization_instructions: Prefer specific categories. When unsure, use `other` and add a short note to internal context.

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: spill, spilled, puddle, leak, wet floor, slippery
issue_categories.description: Liquid spills or leaks on floors that may cause slips.
issue_categories.label: Spill / Wet Floor

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: broken, cracked, damaged, loose, missing, door, handle, shelf, tile
issue_categories.description: Physical damage to store fixtures or building elements.
issue_categories.label: Facility Damage

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: dirty, mess, trash, overflowing, smell, odor, sticky, grime
issue_categories.description: General cleanliness issues in aisles, entrances, or common areas.
issue_categories.label: Cleanliness

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: restroom, bathroom, toilet, sink, soap, paper towel, hand dryer
issue_categories.description: Restroom cleanliness, supplies, or plumbing issues.
issue_categories.label: Restroom

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: fridge, freezer, cooler, refrigeration, temperature, warm, not cold, condenser
issue_categories.description: Refrigeration/cooling equipment issues affecting food safety or comfort.
issue_categories.label: Refrigeration / Cooling

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: checkout, register, card reader, tap, chip, receipt, scanner, scale
issue_categories.description: Checkout lane equipment or process issues.
issue_categories.label: Checkout Equipment

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: cart, trolley, basket, wheel, squeak, stuck
issue_categories.description: Shopping cart or basket availability/condition issues.
issue_categories.label: Carts & Baskets

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: sign, signage, label, price tag, wrong price, missing price
issue_categories.label: Signage / Pricing

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: produce, fruit, vegetables, mold, rotten, bruised, quality
issue_categories.description: Quality issues with produce items or displays.
issue_categories.label: Produce Quality

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: dairy, milk, yogurt, cheese, expired, date, sour
issue_categories.label: Dairy Quality

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: staff, rude, helpful, line, wait, service
issue_categories.description: Customer service, staffing, or wait time concerns.
issue_categories.label: Customer Service

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: suggestion, request, please carry, add, stock, hours, improve
issue_categories.description: Suggestions for products, services, or store improvements.
issue_categories.label: Suggestion

issue_categories.ai_include_keywords: hazard, unsafe, trip, sharp, glass, blocked, emergency
issue_categories.description: Safety hazards not covered by spills (e.g., broken glass, trip hazards).
issue_categories.label: Safety Hazard

issue_categories.description: Use when no other category fits. (Per instructions: add a short note in internal context.)
issue_categories.label: Other

comments.body: Thanks for flagging—team is on it. Please avoid the area until the floor is dry.

issues.description: Water puddle near the entrance mats; floor is slippery when coming in from outside.

reports.body: There’s a puddle right by the entrance mat. Almost slipped walking in.
Wet floor at the front doors near carts. Needs a cone.

updates.message: Associate placed wet floor signs and mopped area; replaced saturated mat.
Checked again after rush—area dry; added extra mat for rainy days.

comments.body: The yogurt felt not as cold as usual. Not sure if it’s just the door being open a lot.

issues.description: Dairy wall cooler feels warm; condensation on doors and milk section not very cold.

reports.body: The dairy cooler doors are fogged up and the milk feels warmer than normal.

updates.message: Maintenance notified; temperature logged and product moved to backup cooler as needed.
Vendor scheduled to inspect condenser and door gaskets.

comments.body: We rebooted the lane and swapped the reader. If it happens again, please note the lane number/time.

issues.description: Card reader at one checkout intermittently fails on tap-to-pay; causes delays.

reports.body: Tap-to-pay didn’t work at lane 3. Cashier had to try chip twice.
Lane 3 reader keeps erroring out. Line backed up.

updates.message: Rebooted POS and cleaned NFC area; monitored for 30 minutes.
Replaced card reader with spare; issue not reproduced afterward.

comments.body: Appreciate it being cleaned quickly—just needs more frequent checks on weekends.

issues.description: Women’s restroom out of paper towels; one sink has very low water pressure.

reports.body: No paper towels in the women’s restroom and the left sink barely has water.

updates.message: Restroom check requested; paper towels to be refilled immediately.
Paper towels restocked; plumbing ticket opened for low pressure at left sink.

comments.body: We pulled the soft berries and rotated the display. Thanks for the heads-up.

issues.description: Strawberries display has several moldy/soft packages; fruit flies around the table.

reports.body: A lot of the strawberries are moldy and there are fruit flies around the display.
Berries table needs attention—saw multiple bad packs.

updates.message: Removed affected product; sanitized display and set fly trap near produce backroom door.

comments.body: The cart corral was empty when I came in. Had to carry everything until I found one.

issues.description: Not enough carts available at peak time; several carts have squeaky/stuck wheels.

reports.body: No carts at the entrance around 5:30pm. Also a few carts have wheels that lock up.

updates.message: Assigned cart run during rush; tagged 6 carts for wheel repair.
Ordered replacement casters; rotating repaired carts back onto floor as parts arrive.

comments.body: We corrected the shelf tag and honored the posted price at checkout. Thanks for reporting.

issues.description: Shelf tag price for cereal doesn’t match register price; confusing promo signage.

reports.body: Cereal shelf tag said $3.49 but it rang up $4.29. Promo sign was unclear.

updates.message: Verified discrepancy; replaced shelf label and removed outdated promo sign.

comments.body: It’s noticeably dim in that corner—hard to read labels.

issues.description: Flickering light fixture in frozen aisle; strobing effect is uncomfortable.

reports.body: One of the lights in the frozen aisle is flickering a lot.

updates.message: Added to facilities list; replacement LED driver ordered.

comments.body: We’ve asked the team to do a mid-day sweep and wipe the handles more often.

issues.description: Trash overflowing near self-checkout; sticky residue on bagging area.

reports.body: Self-checkout trash is overflowing and the bagging area is sticky.
Bins full by self checkout. Needs a wipe down.

updates.message: Emptied bins and sanitized self-checkout bagging stations.
Added extra trash pull to evening checklist.

issues.description: Loose floor tile edge near endcap creates a trip hazard.

reports.body: There’s a tile lifting up near the endcap in aisle 2. I almost tripped.

updates.message: Placed caution cone and taped edge temporarily; facilities contractor contacted.
Contractor scheduled for tile replacement; area being monitored daily.

comments.body: We pulled the affected items and checked the rest of the lot. Thank you for reporting.

issues.description: Expired yogurt cups found on shelf; date rotation may be missed.

reports.body: Found two yogurts expired by 5 days still on the shelf.

updates.message: Dairy team notified; performed immediate date check and pulled expired items.

comments.body: Appreciate the suggestion—passing to purchasing. We’re also reviewing weekend staffing at the front end.

issues.description: Request to stock more plant-based milk options and add a second express lane during weekend rush.

reports.body: Could you carry more oat milk brands (unsweetened) and maybe open another express lane on weekends?

comments.body: The door handle feels like it’s going to come off.

issues.description: Restroom door handle is loose; difficult to open/close without pulling hard.

reports.body: The restroom hallway door handle is loose and wobbly. Might break soon.

updates.message: Tightened mounting screws and applied threadlocker; tested for stability.

comments.body: Thanks for the note. We’re checking the HVAC schedule and will monitor temps in that area.

issues.description: Store feels unusually warm near bakery area in the afternoon. (Other: comfort/HVAC not otherwise categorized.)

reports.body: It gets really warm near the bakery around 3–5pm. Not sure if AC is working there.

updates.message: Facilities to verify HVAC vent output and thermostat readings near bakery.

locations.full_path: Fresh Mart / Dairy / Dairy Wall Cooler
locations.name: Dairy Wall Cooler

locations.full_path: Fresh Mart / Grocery Aisles / Aisle 2 Endcap
locations.name: Aisle 2 Endcap

locations.full_path: Fresh Mart / Customer Service / Service Desk
locations.name: Service Desk
